name: MICHAEL SKIBA, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Jeffrey A. Beard, Ph.D., Secretary, Appellees

parties: MICHAEL SKIBA, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Jeffrey A. Beard, Ph.D., Secretary, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of April, 2008, probable jurisdiction is noted; the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
945 A.2d 164
MICHAEL SKIBA, Appellant v. DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Jeffrey A. Beard, Ph.D., Secretary, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 22, 2008.
